review: Love it. Turns your tv into a smart tv
author: Phyllis

review: Easy to set up. Provides more viewing entertainment at a low cost
author: bookie

review: Perfect for streaming netflix and hulu, and very easy to set up.
author: ATI25

review: This works good for what it does.  The only down side is you have to use a computer, tablet, or phone to be able to stream any media to it which makes it a little hard for my 5 year old to use.  I have since purchased a Roku device and it is a lot more friendly for the whole family to use.
author: HermitVA

review: what it does, it does well. excellent quality, for an incredible price
author: Roberto Scattini

review: Worked great streaming from my Nexus 5 and Nexus 7
author: John Thompson

review: Great piece of media equipment.  I tried Roku and did not like it at all.  This is a much better product and I would recommend to anyone.
author: Mr.Tony
